fields.headline: Carragher coin arrest
fields.bodyText: A man was arrested in connection with an incident in which a coin was thrown at Liverpool's Jamie Carragher. The 19-year-old was arrested in or near Highbury during the Gunners' 4-1 win over Fulham, Scotland Yard said. He was taken to Islington police station on suspicion of throwing a coin on to the pitch during the FA Cup fourth-round match on 27 January. Carragher was sent off for throwing a coin back into the crowd.
